description: This file provides configuration logic for selecting and returning a storage repository implementation, primarily based on environment variables. It includes helper functions for environment variable parsing and a public interface for retrieving repository instances.

classes.name: Repository
classes.description: An interface or abstract class representing storage backend behavior.

classes.name: InMemoryRepository
classes.description: A concrete implementation of Repository that stores data in memory.

methods.name: Optional[int] _get_env_int(name: str)
methods.description: Helper function that fetches an environment variable and converts it to an integer if possible.

methods.name: Repository get_repository()
methods.description: Public method that reads environment variables to determine which Repository implementation to instantiate and return.
